title: Java 1.7 Animations
briefDescription: Do you hate the vanilla bedrock player animations and general feel of the new bedrock? Or maybe you want yet another way to make bedrock ...
Description: My contacts: discord: ambient#2309 Youtube channel (subscribe if you want to see more packs!)

crawledImageUrls.text: Do you hate the vanilla bedrock player animations and general feel of the new bedrock? Or maybe you want yet another way to make bedrock closer to java PVP. Look no further, because this pack makes many improvements and tweaks to player animations to more closely resemble Java edition 1.7 (and even bedrock 1.12!).
One of the most notable changes is the tweaking of right hand position and rotation, both in 1st and 3rd person. Body rotation has also been tweaked to more closely resemble java edition.
The armor now will turn red when players take damage. You can also change the tint to match bedrock edition 1.12 in the subpacks section. Damage particles are included.
The player now has the 1.7 ?punch-eating? animation when eating food or drinking a potion, just look down at the floor to activate.
The fire model now extends throughout the entire player?s body, like in java edition. The orange fire overlay has also been disabled.
Inventory shift-clicking animations, slot border, and hotbar popping animations have been disabled, as they appear in Java edition. Thanks for the help LukasPAH!
The player model now renders 2D in the start and pause menu, like bedrock edition 1.12.
A visual sword blocking animation has been added when you crouch to sneak, and can be disabled with subpacks to fit your preference.
Fishing rods now have critical hit particles and the bobber is 2D. All other projectiles are now scaled according to their distance from the camera, like in Java edition.

title: Custom Damage Particles
briefDescription: Have you ever wished that bedrock edition had more cool PVP/aesthetic features like the Java Edition? Or maybe you wish to spruce up your ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wished that bedrock edition had more cool PVP/aesthetic features like the Java Edition? Or maybe you wish to spruce up your bedrock PVP experience, then this pack is perfect for you. Whenever you or another player take damage, unique particles emit. You can choose between 13 total different settings and color options for even further customizability.
This pack comes with 13 total different subpacks. Choose between the default color (the marine-green color from the original java edition sharpness particles ), red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, rainbow (user favorite), and epilepsy (flickering black and white, if you?re into that). You are also given the ability to add multipliers to the default and rainbow colors for a more?outstanding? experience.

title: Custom Damage Colors
briefDescription: If you're bored of seeing the same old red damage overlay whenever you lose health, then this is the resource pack for you. Applying this ...

crawledImageUrls.text: If you?re bored of seeing the same old red damage overlay whenever you lose health, then this is the resource pack for you. Applying this pack will give you the ability to change the damage overlay overlay color of all entities*, with the option to choose from a wide array of different colors.

You can choose between either default (red), orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, black, white, rainbow, or none (no damage color).
This resource pack works as a global resource, both in your own world and others, including realms and servers.

title: Chillihero2k Texture Pack
briefDescription: The pack is suitable for every game type, but I recommend the PVP texture pack for the game modes like Bedwars, Skywars, FFAs, Treasurewars and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The pack is suitable for every game type, but I recommend the PVP texture pack for the game modes like Bedwars, Skywars, FFAs, Treasurewars and almost every other game mode that is related to PVP.
It?s a violet texturepack with a beatiful sky, highquality Items and many Things edited.
It also has some features which are very special and unique wich you can find down below.
It?s super clean and the for many different pvp modes perfekt to use.
Because I ( Chillihero ) have achieved 2000 subscribers on Youtube, I?ve created a unique Violet Pack in my own Style.
I recommend to use it in Bedwars, Treasurewars and Skywars.
If you Like Texturepacks please consider Subscribing on my Youtube Channel The pack is high-resolution and therefore more suitable for good devices.
I am a German Pack Creator and Pack Porter.

All Pots are Edited, XP Bottles include. I Love short Swords so I made my Swords short.
Take a look by yourself!
Im in Love with this Sky. It?s a High Resolution Sky in a beautiful Violet / White
Almost every Ore is edited in a way. you?ve never seen like that. Also every Block of the Ingots is edited.
The Ingots suit the Ores and look super amazing. I personally love the Brick.
I have modified the beds, so now my skin is ?sleeping? in the bed. A unique feature, which has almost never been seen before in MCPE / MCBE.

Fire and Lava are in a Violet Style.
The Water is Clear for a perfect View in Lakes and Rivers.

The Armor is also made Highquality.
Hotbar / Hearts / Food

After three months, I finally made an original texture package of my own. A new name represents a new beginning.
Drawing is just of my interests. Later, due to a series of things, I became a texture pack author by accident.
It started as an interest and now it?s a challenge for me.

The texture pack requires a minimum of 4G ram for the phone to run.

briefDescription: I actually made this pack for personal usage but a few people seemed to be interested in it, So i decided to upload it on ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
I actually made this pack for personal usage but a few people seemed to be interested in it, So i decided to upload it on MCPEDL. This Resource pack will feature some tweaks inspired by Kylo Ren from Star Wars,
? Diamond Armor as Kylo Ren?s Armour,
? Elytra as an Cloak, (black)
? Diamond Sword as Kylo Ren?s Crossguard Lightsaber,

? Trident as Double-bladed Lightsaber,
? Bow as Blaster rifle, (that shoots lasers!) + indicator
? Diamond Sword as Kylo Ren?s Crossguard Lightsaber,
? Full Moon as Death Star,

? Some flipbook kind of thing?
to do it equip: Wooden Sword, -> Golden Sword, -> Diamond Sword,
? And Custom paintings,
